pullrequest.title: Disable portion of AudioDecoder.CheerFile test since it's always failing (#1189)

content.raw: The difference is that the disabled physics tests never worked, but the audio decoder test did. A transition from passing to failing could be a bad test or it could be a sign that gazebo is broken. It's better to err on the side of caution and fix the problem.
content.html: The difference is that the disabled physics tests never worked, but the audio decoder test did. A transition from passing to failing could be a bad test or it could be a sign that gazebo is broken. It's better to err on the side of caution and fix the problem.
